items.name: Green Acres Petting Farm
items.short_description: A charming farm where children can interact with friendly animals, learn about farm life, and enjoy pony rides. Perfect for a hands-on agricultural experience.
items.address: Saddle Road, Maraval, Port of Spain

items.name: Little Sprout Gardens
items.short_description: Kids can get their hands dirty planting seeds, harvesting vegetables, and understanding the cycle of nature. Educational workshops are held weekly.
items.address: Long Circular Road, St. James, Port of Spain

items.name: Barnyard Buddies Experience
items.short_description: An interactive farm experience featuring feeding sessions with goats, sheep, and chickens. Includes a tractor ride around the property.
items.address: Lady Chancellor Road, Port of Spain

items.name: Farmer's Friend Orchard
items.short_description: Explore a fruit orchard where kids can pick seasonal fruits and learn about tropical agriculture. Features a small petting area and picnic spots.
items.address: Western Main Road, Carenage, Port of Spain

items.name: Jurassic Jungle PoS
items.short_description: Step back in time to an era of colossal creatures. This park features life-sized animatronic dinosaurs hidden within a lush, tropical setting.
items.address: Invaders Bay, Audrey Jeffers Highway, Port of Spain

items.name: Dino Dig Discovery Site
items.short_description: Aspiring paleontologists can unearth dinosaur bones in a simulated excavation pit. Includes a small museum showcasing real fossils.
items.address: Wrightson Road Extension, Port of Spain

items.name: Raptor Run Adventure
items.short_description: A thrilling outdoor park with dinosaur-themed obstacle courses and a mini-golf course. Beware of the 'roaming' raptors!
items.address: Circular Road, St. Augustine (near Port of Spain)

items.name: Triassic Trail Walk
items.short_description: A scenic walking trail through a recreation of a Triassic period landscape, complete with static dinosaur models and informational plaques.
items.address: Queen's Park Savannah, Port of Spain

items.name: Whispering Woods Tales
items.short_description: Discover a magical forest where beloved fairy tales come to life through interactive exhibits and live storytelling sessions. A truly immersive narrative experience.
items.address: Royal Botanic Gardens, Port of Spain

items.name: Legendary Lane Adventures
items.short_description: Journey through a park dedicated to local folklore and Caribbean myths. Each path leads to a new story, told by animated figures and soundscapes.
items.address: Nelson Street, Port of Spain

items.name: Imagination Station Park
items.short_description: A vibrant park designed to spark creativity, with dedicated zones for role-playing, puppet shows, and creating original stories. Daily workshops available.
items.address: Ariapita Avenue, Woodbrook, Port of Spain

items.name: The Rhyme & Reason Garden
items.short_description: A whimsical garden where nursery rhymes are brought to life with colourful sculptures and interactive installations. Perfect for toddlers and preschoolers.
items.address: Cascade Road, Port of Spain

items.name: Brick City Builders Lab
items.short_description: An indoor wonderland filled with millions of building bricks, offering free-play zones, challenging build competitions, and expert-led workshops.
items.address: Frederick Street, Port of Spain

items.name: Mega Blocks Construction Zone
items.short_description: A spacious outdoor park designed for collaborative building with oversized blocks and construction equipment. Great for gross motor skills and teamwork.
items.address: Champs Fleurs, Port of Spain (East)

items.name: Robo-Bricks Engineering Hub
items.short_description: Focuses on robotics and engineering using advanced building kits. Kids can design, build, and program their own robotic creations.
items.address: Corner of Tragarete Road & Cipriani Blvd, Port of Spain

items.name: Mini Masterpiece Studio
items.short_description: A creative space where children can build and display their Lego creations. Features themed building challenges and a gallery for young artists.
items.address: Independence Square, Port of Spain

items.name: Lost Temple Treasure Hunt
items.short_description: Embark on an epic quest through a themed 'lost temple' environment, solving puzzles and overcoming challenges to find hidden treasures. Ideal for thrill-seekers.
items.address: Western Main Road, St. James, Port of Spain

items.name: Spy Kids Mission Headquarters
items.short_description: Recruits undergo secret agent training, complete with laser mazes, code-breaking activities, and covert ops simulations. Great for strategic thinkers.
items.address: Park Street, Port of Spain

items.name: Enchanted Forest Escape
items.short_description: A magical escape room experience set in an enchanted forest. Teams must solve riddles and find clues to break a spell before time runs out.
items.address: Queens Park East, Port of Spain

items.name: Pirate's Cove Challenge
items.short_description: Set sail on an outdoor pirate adventure, navigating treacherous waters, finding buried treasure, and outwitting rival pirate crews. Water-based activities included.
items.address: Dock Road, Chaguaramas (near Port of Spain)

items.name: Queen's Park Adventureland
items.short_description: A sprawling outdoor adventure park with multiple playgrounds, climbing structures, zip lines, and obstacle courses for all age groups. Ideal for active kids.
items.address: Queen's Park Savannah, Port of Spain

items.name: Splash & Slide Water Fun
items.short_description: A vibrant water park featuring various slides, splash pads, and shallow pools. Perfect for cooling off and having a wet, wild time.
items.address: Eastern Main Road, San Juan (near Port of Spain)

items.name: Treetop Trekkers Course
items.short_description: An aerial adventure park with suspended bridges, climbing nets, and zip lines high among the trees. Offers different difficulty levels for all ages.
items.address: Macqueripe Road, Chaguaramas (near Port of Spain)

items.name: Downtown Kids Play Space
items.short_description: An urban indoor playground with soft play areas, climbing walls, and interactive games, perfect for younger children on rainy days.
items.address: Henry Street, Port of Spain

items.name: Enchanted Forest of Dreams
items.short_description: Wander through a magical forest inhabited by fairy tale characters and creatures. Features themed rides, puppet shows, and charming storybook settings.
items.address: Lady Young Road, Morvant, Port of Spain

items.name: Princess Palace & Knight's Keep
items.short_description: Live out royal fantasies at this themed park. Children can meet princesses, train as knights, and explore a grand castle complete with a dragon's lair.
items.address: Queens Park West, Port of Spain

items.name: Gnome's Secret Garden
items.short_description: A miniature world where children can explore tiny houses, hidden paths, and discover the magical lives of garden gnomes and fairies. Interactive and charming.
items.address: St. Ann's Road, Port of Spain

items.name: Neverland Adventure Zone
items.short_description: Fly to Neverland and join Peter Pan, Captain Hook, and the Lost Boys in a series of swashbuckling adventures and imaginative play zones.
items.address: Mucurapo Road, Port of Spain

items.name: Discovery Cove Children's Museum
items.short_description: An interactive museum where kids can explore science, art, and culture through hands-on exhibits, workshops, and engaging displays. Learning is fun here!
items.address: Cor. Abercromby St. & Independence Square, Port of Spain

items.name: Little Innovators Workshop
items.short_description: Dedicated to inspiring young inventors, this museum features stations for engineering, coding, and building. Encourages creative problem-solving.
items.address: Richmond Street, Port of Spain

items.name: World Explorers Gallery
items.short_description: A cultural journey for kids, featuring exhibits on different countries, their traditions, and art forms. Promotes global awareness and diversity.
items.address: Chancellor Hill, St. Clair, Port of Spain

items.name: Tiny Tot Art & Play Centre
items.short_description: Designed for toddlers and preschoolers, this center combines sensory play with early art exploration, fostering creativity and motor skills development.
items.address: Fitzgerald Lane, Port of Spain

items.name: Star Gazer's Little Dome
items.short_description: A beginner-friendly planetarium offering immersive shows about stars, planets, and constellations. Features interactive exhibits on space exploration.
items.address: University of the West Indies, St. Augustine (near Port of Spain)

items.name: Cosmic Kids Journey
items.short_description: Take a simulated voyage through the solar system with engaging 3D projections and narration tailored for young minds. Special 'Junior Astronaut' programs available.
items.address: National Academy for the Performing Arts, Port of Spain

items.name: Galaxy Gaze Centre
items.short_description: An introductory planetarium focusing on constellations and myths associated with the night sky. Includes a portable telescope experience on clear evenings.
items.address: Wrightson Road, Port of Spain

items.name: Nebula Navigators Hub
items.short_description: An interactive hub for exploring galaxies and nebulae with digital displays and hands-on activities that explain celestial phenomena. Ideal for slightly older children.
items.address: Port of Spain Public Library, Knox Street, Port of Spain

items.name: Toon Town Plaza Meetup
items.short_description: Meet and greet your favourite classic cartoon characters live! Enjoy photo opportunities, character performances, and themed activities. Schedule varies weekly.
items.address: Trincity Mall (near Port of Spain)

items.name: Hero Haven Pop-Up
items.short_description: A rotating event where children can meet popular superhero and animated film characters. Expect interactive sessions, themed games, and special appearances.
items.address: Movietowne, Invaders Bay, Port of Spain

items.name: Mascot Mania Funfest
items.short_description: A lively festival featuring a variety of beloved mascots and cartoon figures. Enjoy parades, dance-offs, and plenty of opportunities for hugs and high-fives.
items.address: Centre of Excellence, Macoya (near Port of Spain)

items.name: Storybook Friends Corner
items.short_description: A cozy, intimate setting where children can meet characters from classic storybooks and popular children's shows. Includes storytelling and craft sessions.
items.address: Queens Park Savannah, Port of Spain
